data.name: 顶酱
data.detailed_description: “顶酱”讲述了一位天赋异禀、拥有神奇能力的男生，在充满危机的陌生的异世界经历各种事件，一步一步找到真相的故事。
data.about_the_game: “顶酱”讲述了一位天赋异禀、拥有神奇能力的男生，在充满危机的陌生的异世界经历各种事件，一步一步找到真相的故事。

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 610
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3090
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
